headline: The Hidden Headwinds for AMD: Why Truist Just Lowered Its Price Target
summary: Truist recently lowered the price target on Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) to $111 from $130 and kept a Hold rating on the shares. AMD operates as a semiconductor manufacturer. In an investor note, the analyst noted that the company’s Q1 result was good overall, but the outlook included several complicating factors like a reduction […]
